mapper.select: SELECT p.product_seq, p.category_seq, c.category_name, p.sector_seq, g.grade_name, p.user_seq, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_status, p.register_date, p.update_date, p.product_amount, p.product_weight FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_seq = c.category_seq LEFT JOIN grade g ON p.grade_seq = g.grade_seq WHERE p.user_seq = #{ userSeq } AND p.delete_yn = 0 ORDER BY p.register_date
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET delete_yn = true WHERE product_seq = #{ productSeq }
